product_name: Brooks Poly Pro ESST Low Quarter Socks - Men's - Package of 2
long_description: The moisture-wicking, durable Brooks Poly Pro ESST Low Quarter Socks for men bring lots of comfort to your hard training sessions. Nylon/polypropylene/spandex fabric wicks moisture, dries fast and stretches to provide light compression and a great fit. Mesh panels on the tops allow cooling airflow to help keep your feet dry. Targeted arch compression offers support. Flat toe seam won't rub and cause irritation. Please note: a package of 2 pairs counts as 1 pair of socks for the 10% volume discount. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The moisture-wicking, durable Brooks Poly Pro ESST Low Quarter Socks for men bring lots of comfort to your hard training sessions.
